Price drops of up to $200 off have been issued on Apple's M4 iPad Pro, with prices starting at $899. Plus, grab an Apple Pencil Pro for just $99.

We're keeping tabs on the best iPad deals this weekend and today's top offers include markdowns on Apple's current iPad Pro, along with a fresh price drop on the Apple Pencil Pro.

Pick up the standard M4 11-inch iPad Pro for $899, a discount of $100 off retail. This Standard Glass spec with 256GB capacity and Wi-Fi connectivity is eligible in your choice of Space Black or Silver.

Buy 11" for $899

If you're looking for the larger 13-inch model, Amazon has shaved $200 off both Wi-Fi Only and Wi-Fi + Cellular models. Prices start at $1,099.

Save $200 on 13"

Both the 11-inch and 13-inch M4 lines are compatible with the Apple Pencil Pro, which is down to $99 on Amazon as well, a discount of $30 off MSRP.

Apple Pencil Pro $99
